# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for React (http://facebook.github.io/react/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/react

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Sun, 11 Dec 2016 17:32:29 GMT
 * Library Dependencies: none
 * Module Dependencies: none
 * Global values: React
